alert.note: Alert for White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 20 at 10:19AM CDT until June 26 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Arkansas... White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Augusta. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Farm ground along the river in White and Woodruff counties begin to flood. Seasonal agricultural impacts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 26.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 26.4 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 1 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Crest Time Date White River Augusta 26.0 26.3 Mon 10 AM 26.4 26.2 26.1 26.4 7 AM 6/21 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
